title: are you fucking with me?
body:
my client in champ loading screen freezes post champion select. IT DOES NOT LET ME Exit. It does not let me do anything. I cannot alt tab. all Am watching is the 0% loading people pre-game. I can't do jack shit but turn off my computer, I turn off my fucking computer. I log in again. game was remade. I now have an AFK warning.

you know what. fuck your game dude. just fuck this. biggest game in the world shit. fuck you and the client. I never seen anything like this

replies.body:
Hey dude, sorry for the shitty situation you've been through.  :(  An AFK Warning exists just to let players know about [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), it doesn't actually penalize you unless you have a history of leaves.  The really important thing is to resolve this freezing in the first place.  To start off, it might be good to enable [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode in case your pc is being caused too much stress during champion select.

Test it out in a custom game, but if it continues then your network might be failing and dropping you off.  You'll want to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help improve any of that instability.

I feel your frustration, though, I hope these steps can help.

excuse my french but bitching about it won't make either of your problems with the game better. trust me, just have patience with our lovely rito employees and your problems can be fixed. just submit a support ticket if none of the troubleshooting steps help.

you might need to copy some of your logs from the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and then put them into your [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) along with a detailed description of your problem. it will take more or less than a day for you to get a reply, and if you just have patience (like i did when i needed a client problem fixed) then your problem can be solved.

sincerely
